Description: A unique lake identifier that describes distinct lakes.
The name of the lake as represented in italics within the data descriptor manuscript
A common name used for the lake.
The latitude coordinates in decimal degrees for the sampling location.
The longitude coordinates in decimal degrees for the sampling location.
The continent where the survey location of the target lake occurs.
The country where the survey location of the target lake occurs.
The surface area of the lake in km2.
The average depth of the lake in metres.
The maximum depth of the lake in metres.
The length of the entire shoreline in kilometers.
The names of the contributors of the dataset.
Alternate common names used to describe the target lake, with multiple names separated by a semi-colon.
The resource or dataset where the surface area of the lake was acquired.
The resource or dataset where the mean depth of the lake was acquired.
The resource or dataset where the maximum depth of the lake was acquired.
The resource or dataset where the shoreline of the lake was acquired.
The elevation of the lake based on the location coordinates from Google Maps in meters.
